QuestData.Title: The Klaxxi
QuestData.Description: The Klaxxi are only rumored to exist, far beyond the wall in the Dread Wastes.$B$BFew have ventured into that territory, and none have returned to tell the tale.$B$BIf you are set on finding these... Klaxxi... there is a small group of Shado-Pan manning the wall to the far southwest who may know more.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Bowmistress Li at the Gate of the Setting Sun between the Vale of Eternal Blossoms and the Dread Wastes.
